attributes.action: Ennoble Ken Livingstone and make him Minister for London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ken Livingstone has been a great servant of London for many decades, and whatever opinions people have of his politics, he has been very much a man of the people.  We feel his service to the public should be recognised, and that the Prime Minister recommend to the appropriate body that he be made Baron London (or a similar title), and then promptly appointed to succeed Tessa Jowell as Minister for London, utilising his particular experience and skill at promoting London from within government.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
